data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The search for chemical and physical property data used to be a hunt through multiple volumes of handbooks, dictionaries and treatises. Increasingly, the ____ resources ____ being ____ to ____ versions. Many ____ have ____, ____ patrons ____ utilize ____ vast ____ of ____, ____ data ____ relative ____. However, many ____ them ____ very ____ so ____ institutions ____ not ____ access. Fortunately, there are now excellent free data collections that are easily available.
data.partBlankContent: The search for chemical and physical property data used to be a hunt through multiple volumes of handbooks, dictionaries and treatises. Increasingly, the ma___ resources a__ being conv_____ to onl___ versions. Many libr_____ have acc___, enab____ patrons t_ utilize th___ vast colle______ of eval_____, reli____ data wi__ relative ea__. However, many o_ them a__ very expe_____ so sma____ institutions m__ not ha__ access. Fortunately, there are now excellent free data collections that are easily available.
data.answer: 对化学和物理性质数据的搜索曾经是在多卷的手册、字典和论文中寻找。越来越多的主要资源被转换成在线版本。许多图书馆都有访问权限，使读者能够相对轻松地利用这些经过评估的大量可靠数据。然而，其中许多课程非常昂贵，所以较小的机构可能无法获得。幸运的是，现在有很容易获得的优秀免费数据收集。
